helper

Class CSSManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • helper.CSSManager

  • public class CSSManager
extends java.lang.Object
    Stores and sorts CSS properties for use in element-styling
    Author:
    Moritz Dorka

      • getShorthandProperty

        public static java.lang.String getShorthandProperty(java.lang.String[] input)
        Compresses the input of 4-element CSS properties (border, padding etc.) to leave out redundant information

        Implemented according to the respective Mozilla docs.

        Parameters:
        input - A 4-element array with all extracted data
        Returns:
        A compressed version of the input
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - If at least one input element is null or the dimension of the input is wrong

      • getIdentifier

        public static java.lang.String getIdentifier(java.lang.String input)
        Create a valid CSS identifier (used for class names, ids, ...) according to the W3C Recommendation on Syntax and basic data types
        Parameters:
        input - raw string to be used as the identifier
        Returns:
        a sanitized identifier digestable by CSS
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the parameter is null
